additionalProperties.description: A fully qualified model name with AI provider type and '/' prefix (e.g., 'ollama/llama3.1').

code_diff_type.description: Specifies the type of code diff supported by the model.

code_assist_type.description: Specifies the type of code assistance provided by the model.

threshold.description: Defines the threshold for embedding similarity, between 0 and 1.

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the model's responses. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
